name: HEX (itch) (Atomic Toilet)
description:
You have been cursed to be a hexagon.

Avoid the vampiric revenants.

Avoid the revenant pits.

Escape each level.

Prove your worth and reclaim your true form.

W / A / D move. SPACE lets you hide, but only once per level.

10 levels of simple yet tough (whaaaat) hexagon madness! Made for the Simplicity game jam.
